title: WSB's Weekend Bite Week Ending April 1: Difficult To Be Bullish With Tech Under Pressure
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: This week's episode explores current market dynamics amid pressure on the tech sector. Fundstrat's Mark Newton and Interactive Investors' Victoria Scholar discuss being positioned diversely and defensively.
